flawed_nl_solution:
As she gave 1 balloon out, 12 balloons floated away plus she gave away 9 more balloons so she is down 1+12+9 = <<1+12+9=18>>18 balloons
She started with 50 and gave/lost 18 balloons so she has 50-18 = <<50-18=32>>32 balloons
She also took her coworkers last 11 balloons so her new total is 32+11 = <<32+11=43>>43 balloons
#### 43

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
